title: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program for Supporting Chronic Patients' Self-Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic healthcare knowledge and administrative work experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing Practical Application Through Access to Smartphone-Based Materials and Analysis of Real-World Cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain three practical strategies supporting chronic patients' self-management plans
Learners can apply psychological motivation methods and resource connection techniques in simulation activities with 80% accuracy
Learners can develop self-management support tools (checklists/guidelines) through team-based project implementation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
